ygData.subject: Hello again, and test :)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, all! First off, I wanted to apologize for seeming to be absent from this list recently -- for some reason, the messages weren t coming through to my
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 4
Message-ID: <17248.4.14.959279670@...>
Date: Sat, 12 Sep 1998 02:04:17 -0400
From: Tom Ricket <tricket@...
Subject: Hello again, and test :)


Hi, all!

First off, I wanted to apologize for seeming to be absent from this list
recently -- for some reason, the messages weren't coming through to my
mailbox,
and so I didn't know what to respond to.  I think it's fixed now, so I should
be able to be an *active* official FSGames rep again :>

In terms of problems saving scenarios -- has that been solved yet? Usually,
the
problems occur when trying to *SAVE* a scenario rather than load one, but it
sounds like that's not the case here.

Offhand, all I can think of is that you've tried to make a level that already
exists in the "pack" file (graphics.001, levels.001), and so the game loads
the
default level instead.  Otherwise .. can anyone report any details on this for
me to track down? For example, when you try to load a level, do you get:
        * "Invalid level" message
        * Wrong level loads
        * Game crashes
        * or what?

Also, for Max -- don't worry, we won't be upset if you 'usurp' our position
and
find solutions for people :>  Believe me, we're very happy to have users who
can help figure these things out, so feel free to diagnose to your heart's
conent!

Take care,
  Tom
